reviewText: Fast delivery, received in good condition. Grandson loved it. Good price.
VERY INTERESTING AND ENJOYABLE SERIES FOR KIDS.

This was a great collection of slugtastic episodes that any fan of Slugterra will love! My favorite on this DVD has to be Mario Bravado, but all were fun and continued the great Slugterra action that I have seen in other episodes. This DVD also has some great bonus features (2) and for me my favorite was the behind the scenes look. All-in-all if you are already a fan you will love this collection and if this is your first introduction, get ready for an action packed ride!

*I received this for review - all opinions are my own*

My nephew had this on his Christmas wish list along with other items and he loves it so I guess it is great for him.  I have no idea what this story is about, but he and his brother seem to like it a lot.
Gave as gift for my son. He likes it.
It says than the DVD run 1 hour and 50 min but the DVD that I received just run about 30 min...
I just LOVE this DVD. I highly recommend this seller to anyone.
My 4 year old grandson loves SlugTerra so this DVD was a huge hit!
Ordered this for a friend. It works
